S08n698:3: iha hi mudrānvayavibhrāntyā mūḍhamanaso bhramanti bhavārṇave duḥkhitāḥ |
S08n698:4: teṣāṃ sukhena caturmudrārthapratipattaye tanrānusāreṇa mahāsukhasādhanaṃ prasādhyate |
S08n698:10: karmma yā kāyavāk cittacintā tatpradhānā mudrā kalpanāsvarūpā,
S08n698:11: tasyāṃ karmmamudrāyāṃ ānandā jāyante kṣaṇabhedena bheditāḥ -
S08n698:18: iti yaduktaṃ tat saṅgataṃ na bhavati |
S08n698:29: yasyāḥ sahajaṃ nāma svarūpaṃ sarvvadharmmānāmakṛtrimalakṣaṇaṃ iti yāvat |
S08n698:32: sādṛśyaṃ yathā darpaṇārpitaṃ mukhasya pratibimbaṃ mukhaṃ na bhavati |
S08n698:33: na pūrvvasiddhaṃ nāpyadhunāsiddhaṃ tadeva mukhapratibimbaṃ sādṛśyamātramāpādayati tathāpi lokāḥ svamukhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā bhrāntyā santuṣṭā bhavanti |
S08n698:34: tathaivācāryyāḥ kumatadāḥ prajñājñānamāsādya sahajamanubhūtaṃ iti kṛtvā santoṣaṃ utpādayanti,
S08n698:35: santuṣṭāśca santo dharmmamudrāyā vārttāmapi na jānanti |
S08n698:36: dharmmamudrāmajānānā kevalayā karmmamudrayā kṛtrimayā kathamakṛtrimabhūtaṃ sahajākhyaṃ utpadyate |
S08n698:37: sajātīyāt kāraṇāt sajātīyasya eva kāryyasya utpattirbhavati na tu vijātīyāt yathā śālībījāt śālyaṅkurotpattirbhavati natu kodravyasya |
S08n698:38: tathā dharmmamudrāyā akṛtrimāyāḥ sakāśāt akṛtrimaṃ sahajaṃ utpadyate |
S08n698:46: tat svacchamāsthānaṃ volakakkolarasasaṃyogena avadhṛtyā samvṛtibodhicittamaṇyantargataṃ yadā bhavet tadā kṣaṇikanāmā parasahajākhyaṃ jñānamutpadyate |
S08n698:48: tatsvarūpeṇa prajñājñānānandatrayaḥ kṣaṇacatuṣṭayānvitaṃ mekaṃ haṭhayoge ca karmmamudrāyā niṣpandaphalamuktam |
S08n698:50: om-dharmmamudrā dharmmadhātusvarūpā niṣprapañcā nirvvikalpā akṛtrimā utpādarahitā karuṇāsvabhāvā paramā nandaikasundaropāyabhūtā |
S08n698:51: pravāhanityatvena sahajasvabhāvā yā prajñāyāḥ sahajodayatvena abhinnā yā sā dharma mudretyabhidhīyate |
S08n698:52: anyat lakṣaṇaṃ tasyāḥ saṅkulājñānāndhakāre taraṇikiraṇasadṛśaṃ gurūpadeśataḥ tṛṇatu[ṣa]samā tatrāpi bhrāntiśalyavarjjitaṃ bodhyavyam |
S08n698:58: mārgajñāne sādaranirantaraṃ mārgābhyāsāt nirodhasya sahajasvabhāvasya sākṣātkṛtitvaṃ bhavati |
S08n698:60: nāpaneyaṃ ataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṃ na kiñcana |
S08n698:62: lalanā rasanā tayormadhyadeśe nivāsinī avadhūtī saivādhigatasakalapadārthasahajasvabhāvaikacittavṛtteḥ sadgurūpadeśato dharmmamudrā mahāmudrāyā abhedena hetubhūtā |
S08n698:66: mahāmudrā niḥsvabhāvā jñeyādyāvaraṇavivarjjitā śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganasaṅkāśā sakalasampadādhārabhūtā bhavanirvvāṇaikasvarūpā anālambanakaruṇāśarīrā mahāsukhaikarūpā |
S08n698:67: tathā ca,amanasikārā dharmmā kuśalā manasikārā dharmmā akuśalā pravacane ca |
S08n698:73: hū-samayamudreti sambhoganirmmāṇakāyākārasvabhāvena svacchākāreṇa ca sattvārthāya vajradharasya herukākāreṇa visphuraṇaṃ yat sā samayamudreti copadiśyate |
S08n698:74: tāṃ ca samayamudrāṃ gṛhītvā cakrākāreṇa pañcavidhaṃ jñānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ parikalpya ādarśa-samatā-pratyavekṣaṇā-kṛtyānuṣṭhāna-suviśuddha-dharmmadhātubhiḥ ādiyoga-maṇḍalarājāśri-karmmarājāśri-binduyoga-sūkṣmayogaiḥ samayamudrācakraṃ bhāvayantyācāryyāḥ |
S08n698:78: tasmāt sahajasiddharasāt na bedhena sthiracalādayo yena vā bālaparikalpitā te saṃbodhikā[raṇa]tāmupayānti |
S08n698:79: na mantrajāpo na tapo na homo
S08n698:80: na māṇḍaleyaṃ na ca maṇḍalaṃ ca |
S08n698:81: sa mantrajāpaḥ sa tapaḥ sa homaḥ
S08n698:84: samāsataḥ sarvvadharmmāṇāmekākārato yadut mahāsukhākārataḥ cittamitibodhicittaṃ samājarūpīti |
